text: Latest Trump news: Iran talks face uncertainty, DHS funding remains at impasse - CNN
fullText: US-brokered talks between Ukrainian and Russian delegations ended today in Geneva. In DC, the partial government shutdown continues as both parties remain deadlocked over DHS funding. Follow for live news updates.

text: Stephen Colbert uses his show to roast CBS in feud over FCC rules - The Washington Post
fullText: The FCC chief blasted the Texas Democrat whose interview with Colbert was allegedly blocked by CBS, while claiming Americans trust “gas station sushi” more than the news media.

text: Amber Glenn’s dreams were ‘smashed to pieces’ with just one mistake - The Washington Post
fullText: The three-time U.S. champion is picking up the pieces after a missed jump in the short program dropped her to 13th place.

text: Russia hosts Cuban foreign minister and urges US not to blockade Cuba - Associated Press News
fullText: The Cuban foreign minister is visiting Moscow as the island faces blackouts and severe fuel shortages worsened by a U.S oil embargo. Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez held talks with his Russian counterpart Sergey Lavrov and later in the day with Preside…

text: Nancy Guthrie disappearance: Sheriff pleads with suspect to ‘just let her go,’ insists case not cold - Fox News
fullText: Pima County Sheriff Chris Nanos made a plea Tuesday to the suspect in Nancy Guthrie’s disappearance, urging the individual to “just let her go.” He added that the investigation continues to be a rescue operation and not a recovery mission.

text: The fuel set to propel NASA’s moon crew is notorious for leaking. So why use it? - CNN
fullText: NASA’s first crewed moon mission in decades was delayed as its engineers grapple with an all-too-familiar rocket problem: hydrogen leaks. Fixing the issue is even trickier than it may seem.

text: Musk Rails Against ‘Woke And Sanctimonious’ AI Rivals—Insists ‘Grok Must Win’ - Forbes
fullText: Elon Musk argued his company xAI's chatbot Grok is a counter to rivals ChatGPT, Gemini and Claude, whom he labeled as “woke” and “weak sauce” on culture war issues.

text: ‘Heated Rivalry’ Star Hudson Williams Re-teams With Crave For Baba Yaga Drama - Deadline

text: Trump administration releases remaining Gateway funds — and then some - Politico

text: Trump would like the government he leads to pay him billions - NPR

text: In a golden masterclass, Norway’s Klaebo extends Winter Olympics medal record - Associated Press News

text: Russia's hybrid warfare rattles Poland and NATO - NPR
fullText: Russia is stepping up covert attacks across Europe — rail sabotage, drones, cyberstrikes — testing NATO. Polish officials warn "disposable agents" are sowing fear and weakening support for Ukraine.
